name: pdquickui
description: PDQuickUI contains a lightweight front-end framework designed to separate the front-end user interface and data logic.

scripts.minify: npx terser src/*.js -c -m -o dist/PDQuickUI.js --config-file terser.config.json --name-cache terser.cache.json && npx terser src/*.js -c -m -o dist/PDQuickUI.module.js --config-file terser.config.json --name-cache terser.cache.json && echo 'export const QUI = window.QUI;' >> dist/PDQuickUI.module.js

author: 邱敬幃 Pardn Chiu
